Package com.pilot.jword.reader

Interface Summary
Converter Converter implementations convert String expressions
to domain objects like Color, Border etc.
DocumentReader An interface for reading document content from different document formats such as TXT, RTF, XML, DocX etc.
XHTMLLinkHandler this interface handles links in XHTML reader.
 

Class Summary
BorderConverter Helper class for converting ODT border definitions to actual Borders.
CharReader A helper class for reading RTF documents.
ColorConverter Helper class for converting ODT color values to actula Color objects.
DimensionConverter A helper class for converting ODT dimension expression to actual Dimension object.
FontSizeConverter A helper class for converting XML/CSS font size expressions to actual font size in twips.
JMLBorderConverter A helper class for converting JML border expressions to actual border objects.
JMLDimensionConverter A helper class for converting JML dimension expressions to actula dimension objects.
JMLLengthConverter A helper class for converting JML length expressions to actual lengths in twips.
JMLReader Parses and opens a native XML (JML) document
JXHTMLDimensionConverter A helper class for converting JML dimension expressions to actula dimension objects.
JXHTMLLengthConverter A helper class for converting JXHTML length expressions to actual lengths in twips.
JXHTMLReader Parses and opens a native XHTML (JHTML) document
LengthConverter A helper class for converting ODT length expressions to actual lengths in twips.
ODFReader Parses and opens an ODF document in archived format (ODT)
RTFDocumentReader Reader for RTF documents and RTF pieces
XHTMLReader Parses and opens an XHTML document Currently only opens files written by JWord.Gets the actual content from cached jword.xml
